snippet: President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan condemned American-led forces for killing eight women in airstrikes and denounced his American allies for continuing to hold Afghan prisoners.
abstract: Afghan Pres Hamid Karzai condemns American-led forces for killing eight women in airstrikes and denounces his American allies for continuing to hold hundreds of Afghan prisoners; Karzai's confrontational tone is a sharp reminder of the acrimony that has often characterized relations between himself and his American benefactors.

byline.contributor: Alissa J. Rubin and Sangar Rahimi contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan condemned American-led forces for killing eight women in airstrikes and denounced his American allies for continuing to hold Afghan prisoners.
